citations.narrative:
The perimeter fence measured only 5'8" tall. Animal Welfare Act requires a perimeter fence 6 feet high to protect the
nonhuman primates by restricting unauthorized humans and animals from going through it or under it and having contact
with the nonhuman primates.
Correct by 1 May 2024

citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The environmental enhancement plan for non-human primates was not complete and had not been approved by the
attending veterinarian. The plan focused on the environmental enhancement, but did not address social groupings,
special considerations, restraint devices and exemptions. Exhibitors must develop, document and follow an appropriate
plan for environment enhancement appropriate to promote the psychological well-being of nonhuman primates in
accordance with currently accepted professional standards and as directed by the attending veterinarian.
Correct by 15 April 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.77(f) 
   
Sheltered housing facilities. 
The perimeter fence measured only 5'8" tall. Animal Welfare Act requires a perimeter fence 6 feet high to protect the 
nonhuman primates by restricting unauthorized humans and animals from going through it or under it and having contact 
with the nonhuman primates. 
 
Correct by 1 May 2024 
3.81 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The environmental enhancement plan for non-human primates was not complete and had not been approved by the 
attending veterinarian. The plan focused on the environmental enhancement, but did not address social groupings, 
special considerations, restraint devices and exemptions. Exhibitors must develop, document and follow an appropriate 
plan for environment enhancement appropriate to promote the psychological well-being of nonhuman primates in 
accordance with currently accepted professional standards and as directed by the attending veterinarian. 
 
Correct by 15 April 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
